abstract: Typological features of wers1238. Coded by Marian Klamer following ['/vol/winshare/Public/ResearchData/HUM/LUCL-KlamerVICI/Lesser Sunda Database/KVW_MK_2016_typological_questionnaire Wersing.xlsx', 'Schapper, Antoinette and Rachel Hendery, 2014, Wersing. Klamer (ed.): The Alor-Pantar languages: History and typology, 199-245. Berlin: Language Science Press.'].

name: KVW_MK_2016_typological_questionnaire Wersing.xlsx
references: Schapper, Antoinette and Rachel Hendery, 2014, Wersing. In: A. Schapper (ed): The Papuan languages of Timor Alor and Pantar: Volume I, 439-503.
